items.title: Implement immersive 3D hero section with Three.js
items.description: Create a stunning 3D hero section using Three.js with interactive particles, mouse-following effects, and smooth animations. The scene should be performant and visually striking, featuring a 3D representation of code/tech elements that respond to mouse movement.
acceptance_criteria: Three.js scene loads smoothly without blocking initial render
Mouse interactions work smoothly on desktop and touch devices
Performance impact is minimal (check Lighthouse score)
Scene is responsive across all screen sizes

items.title: Add interactive project showcase with 3D card effects
items.description: Transform the projects section into an interactive showcase with 3D tilt effects on hover, smooth page transitions, and expandable project details. Each project card should have unique visuals and micro-interactions.
acceptance_criteria: 3D tilt effect works smoothly on hover
Project details expand/collapse with smooth animations
Cards are fully accessible via keyboard navigation
Mobile view provides swipeable carousel experience

items.title: Create animated skill visualization with dynamic progress
items.description: Replace static skills list with dynamic, animated visualization. Use animated bars, circles, or network graphs that animate on scroll. Group skills by category and show relative proficiency with smooth filling animations.
acceptance_criteria: Skills animate smoothly when scrolled into view
Each skill category has distinct visual treatment
Interactive tooltips show detailed skill information
Responsive design works on all devices

items.title: Add interactive timeline for experience section
items.description: Create a vertical or horizontal interactive timeline for the CV/experience section with animated nodes, connecting lines that draw as you scroll, and expandable job details with company logos and tech stack badges.
acceptance_criteria: Timeline draws progressively as user scrolls
Clicking on a node expands detailed job information
Responsive layout switches between vertical (mobile) and horizontal (desktop)
All experience entries from CV are included

items.title: Implement smooth scroll progress indicator
items.description: Add a reading progress indicator at the top of the page that shows scroll progress. Make it smooth and visually integrated with the design, with optional section highlighting as you scroll through different sections.
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar updates smoothly on scroll
Progress bar is visible but not obtrusive
Works correctly with smooth scrolling enabled
Section navigation highlights current section

items.title: Add magnetic button effects and micro-interactions
items.description: Implement magnetic hover effects on buttons and interactive elements. Buttons should subtly follow the cursor before clicking. Add satisfying click animations, ripple effects, and other micro-interactions throughout the site.
acceptance_criteria: Magnetic effect works smoothly without being distracting
Click animations provide satisfying feedback
All buttons have consistent interaction patterns
Effects don't interfere with accessibility

items.title: Create custom cursor with reactive effects
items.description: Implement a custom cursor that changes based on what it's hovering over (links, buttons, interactive elements). Add trailing effects, blend modes, and reactive animations that make the cursor feel alive and responsive.
acceptance_criteria: Custom cursor doesn't interfere with system cursor functionality
Cursor changes appropriately based on hover target
Performance impact is minimal
Falls back gracefully on touch devices

items.title: Add interactive dark/light mode with smooth transitions
items.description: Enhance the existing dark/light mode toggle with smooth color transitions, theme-aware animations, and persistent preference storage. Add unique accent colors for each theme that complement the overall design.
acceptance_criteria: Theme transition is smooth with color interpolation
Theme preference persists across sessions
All components support both themes correctly
Accent colors are well-chosen for each theme

items.title: Implement scroll-triggered animations for all sections
items.description: Add scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer or Framer Motion. Elements should fade in, slide up, or scale as they enter the viewport. Create varied animation patterns for different sections to keep it interesting.
acceptance_criteria: Animations trigger correctly when elements enter viewport
Different sections have varied animation patterns
Animations are smooth and performant
Reduced motion preference is respected

items.title: Add parallax effects to background elements
items.description: Implement parallax scrolling effects on background shapes, gradients, or images. Create depth and movement that responds to scroll speed and direction. Use subtle effects that enhance without being overwhelming.
acceptance_criteria: Parallax effects are subtle and enhance the design
Performance is maintained (check for jank)
Effects work smoothly on all devices
Don't cause motion sickness with excessive movement

items.title: Create interactive contact form with real-time validation
items.description: Enhance the contact form with real-time validation, animated success/error states, and a better UX. Add field animations, inline error messages, and a satisfying submission experience with visual feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Form validates in real-time with clear error messages
Success/error states are visually distinct and animated
Form is fully accessible via keyboard
All form submissions work correctly

items.title: Add loading animation and smooth page transitions
items.description: Create a sophisticated loading animation that plays on initial page load. Implement smooth transitions between pages/sections with shared element animations and seamless state changes.
acceptance_criteria: Loading animation plays smoothly and doesn't feel too long
Page transitions are smooth and don't cause jarring jumps
Shared elements animate predictably between states
Loading state handles errors gracefully

items.title: Implement interactive project filters and search
items.description: Add filtering capabilities to the projects section by technology, type, or category. Include a search bar that filters projects in real-time. Make filtering and searching smooth with animated transitions.
acceptance_criteria: Filters work correctly for all project categories
Search functionality finds matching projects
Filter transitions are smooth and animated
All projects are visible when no filters are applied

items.title: Optimize performance and improve Core Web Vitals
items.description: Audit the site for performance issues and optimize load times. Implement code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, and other performance best practices. Target Core Web Vitals scores above 90.
acceptance_criteria: Lighthouse performance score is above 90
LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) is under 2.5s
FID (First Input Delay) is under 100ms
CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift) is under 0.1

items.title: Enhance accessibility across the entire site
items.description: Conduct a full accessibility audit and improve ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus states, color contrast, and screen reader support. Ensure the site is usable by everyone.
acceptance_criteria: All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Screen reader navigation works smoothly
Focus states are visible and clear

items.title: Implement Easter eggs and hidden interactions
items.description: Add delightful Easter eggs and hidden interactions throughout the site. These could be triggered by specific actions, key combinations, or patterns. Make them fun but not intrusive to the main experience.
acceptance_criteria: Easter eggs are discoverable but not obvious
They don't interfere with normal site usage
At least 3-5 hidden interactions are implemented
They add personality without being gimmicky
